pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Tiger Blog EngineTiger Blog Engine (TBE)provides easy generation of website/blog pages. It creates index.html pages from your markdown files.```Usage: tigerblog.py build [--config=<config>] [--future] tigerblog.py serve tigerblog.py buildserve [--config=<config>] [--future] tigerblog.py print [--config=<config>]Options: -h --help```
